channel.title: Sooo adding new godswords [pi]
channel.description: so today i was bored and decided to add the new godsword models to my [pi] source. i added them to my cache and i put my ints in my itemdef...and what do ya know..it worked like every other time! woo! buuut..i went to put on the godsword and nothing happened to my character..the item shows perfectly on floor in my invy shows on my equip screen but when i wear it it doesnt show up? is this because of my model header or something? and i can post a picture if you need me to but its just invisible lol

item.title: Sooo adding new godswords [pi]
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

yes i have…like i said the item looks perfect on the ground and in the inventory but when i equip it then it goes invisible…

it looks 100% in rsdatmaker and i know that my itemdef is right…(i didnt get the ground model and equip model backwards)

here are the ints i used if that helps

case 20085: itemDef.name = "@mag@Armadyl godsword"; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.itemActions[2] = "Dismantle"; itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop"; itemDef.modelid = 71769; itemDef.stackable = false; itemDef.modelRotationY = 228; itemDef.modelZoom = 2000; itemDef.anInt165 = 72135; itemDef.anInt200 = 72135; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 5; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -55; itemDef.modelRotationX = 1985; itemDef.description = "A beautiful, heavy sword."; break;

Read full topic
